item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 1:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Unity’s Open-Source Double Standard: the ban of VLC (96 points | 29 comments)
2. Richest 10 Percent Responsible for Two-Thirds of Warming (18 points | 4 comments)
3. CLion Is Now Free for Non-Commercial Use (89 points | 29 comments)
4. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (1012 points | 243 comments)
5. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (427 points | 206 comments)
6. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (567 points | 498 comments)
7. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (363 points | 120 comments)
8. Everyone Is Cheating Their Way Through College (28 points | 22 comments)
9. Zed: The Fastest AI Code Editor (48 points | 46 comments)
10. Cuttlefish 'talk' with their arms, study reveals (52 points | 36 comments)
11. The World Of dBASE (1984) [video] (18 points | 4 comments)
12. Migrating a JavaScript Project from Prettier and ESLint to BiomeJS (12 points | 6 comments)
13. U.S. Jury Orders NSO Group to Pay $168M in WhatsApp Spyware Case (14 points | 1 comment)
14. WebMonkeys: parallel GPU programming in JavaScript (76 points | 11 comments)
15. Sandy Bridge-era motherboard gets M.2 SSD boot support 12 years after launch (19 points | 6 comments)
16. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (84 points | 27 comments)
17. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (86 points | 49 comments)
18. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
19. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (480 points | 444 comments)
20. VVVVVV Source Code (329 points | 54 comments)
21. My quest to make motorcycle riding that tad bit safer (5 points | discuss)
22. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (182 points | 122 comments)
23. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (144 points | 19 comments)
24. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (637 points | 610 comments)
25. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (146 points | 232 comments)
26. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (89 points | 38 comments)
27. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (137 points | 73 comments)
28. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (43 points | 21 comments)
29. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (391 points | 446 comments)
30. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (77 points | 10 comments)
